lead_paragraph: The Nets reached agreements with the free-agent forwards Eduardo Najera and Jarvis Hayes. Najera, an eight-year N.B.A. veteran, averaged 5.9 points and 4.3 rebounds in 78 games last season for Denver. Hayes played in 82 games for Detroit last season and averaged 6.7 points and 2.2 rebounds.
